data.text:
True Reflections Glass | Holland, MI

Custom shower glass, mirrors, custom closet systems, commercial storefront, new windows, and window repairs.

Glass Work

We specialize in fabricating custom glass cut to your exact needs. From shower doors to glass table tops, we have the right glass for your project.

Mirrors

Let us create the perfect sized and styled mirror for your space. The right mirror will make your room feel larger, brighter, and more inviting.

Custom Closets

Get an affordable custom closet option without paying the large price tag of other solutions. TR Glass is your home for Rubbermaid storage solutions.

Commercial Glass

True Reflection has partnered with West Michigan’s best builders to build out show-stopping glass storefronts, windows, and doors.

True Reflections is locally-owned and operated with over 20 years of experience in organization and glass products. Look at the photos of the amazing work we have completed and let us know if there’s any way that we can help with your project!

Need an initial quote? Tell us about your project!
